Ralph Reick

  1. Foster Name: Ralph Reick
  2. Foster Family: Heiber
  3. Location of Family: Tekamah, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tekamah, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1916-11-13
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: The Burt County Herald, 26 October 1922; Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf. Plains Bound: Fragile Cargo: Revealing Orphan Train Reality (Outskirts Press, 2006), p. 10-11; National Orphan Train Complex.
